greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan matrix (1/(1-x-x^2-x^3),(x+x^2+x^3)/(1-x-x^2-x^3).
formula: a(n,k) = Sum_{i=0..n-k} binomial(i+k,k)*trinomial(i+k,n-k-i), where trinomial(n,k) are the trinomial coefficients (A027907).
Recurrence: a(n+3,k+1) = a(n+2,k+1) + a(n+2,k) + a(n+1,k+1) + a(n+1,k) + a(n,k+1) + a(n,k)
mathematica: RiordanSquare[1/(1 - x - x^2- x^3), 11] // Flatten (* _Peter Luschny_, Nov 27 2018 *)
results.author: _Emanuele Munarini_, Mar 15 2011
